cards.name: Ancient Tomb
cards.text: Ancient Tomb deals 2 damage to you. There is no glory to gained in the kingdom of the dead. — Vec tomb inscription

cards.name: Arid Mesa
cards.text: Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Arid Mesa: Search your library for a Mountain or Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

cards.name: Bloodstained Mire
cards.text: Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Bloodstained Mire: Search your library for a wamp or Mountain card and put it onto the battlefield. Then suffle your library. Where dragons once triumphed, their bones now molder.

cards.name: Boseiju, Who Endures
cards.text: Channel — 1, Discard Boseiju, Who Endures: Destroy target artifact, enchantment or nonbasic land an opponent controls. Thatplayer may search their library for a land card with a basic land type, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. This ability costs 1 less to activate for each legendary creature you control.

cards.name: Bountiful Promenade
cards.text: Bountiful Promenade enters the battlefield tapped unless you have two or more opponents.

cards.name: Cavern of Souls
cards.text: As Cavern of Souls enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Add one mana of any color- Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell Of the chosen type, and that spell can't be countered.

cards.name: Command Tower
cards.text: e : Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. 'Approach my tower on bended knee or departfrom it as ash upon the wind.' —Gadzvick, the Wizened

cards.name: Contested Cliffs
cards.text: Add 1 to your mana pool. Target Beast creature you control fights target creature an opponent controls. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the Other.)
